product_name: Brooks Epiphany Support Tank Top II - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Epiphany Support Tank Top II from Brooks uses a built-in sports bra to offer flattering coverage and support. Lightweight polyester fabric offers a soft touch, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Strategically placed mesh panels enhance ventilation. Breathable, padded cups offer shaped encapsulation and high-impact support. Seamless cups enhance comfort, and interior bra band wicks moisture and helps maintain comfort. Front and back reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. Double-strap racerback offers eye-catching style and promotes freedom of motion. The Brooks Epiphany Support Tank Top II offers a next-to-body fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Epiphany Support Tank Top II from Brooks uses a built-in sports bra to offer flattering coverage and support.
